attributes.review: This is a horrible campaign app. the app took weeks to download... on top of that everything is way overpriced. I ordered a hat off of the site and it just arrived today; the hat quality was arguably the worst I’ve ever felt, definitely will not be wearing it. I do not recommend this app and I will for sure never be buying any more Donald merch.
attributes.title: Disappointing app

attributes.review: i got this app to feed my turtle to the right chair but for some reason the doll didn’t sit so i saw an orange thing flying on top of the house and when i noticed that the dog said “Donald trump” i swam to the whale and then i was finally able to delete this HORRIBLE APP this is probably the worst experience i had ever had with an app and just don’t get it bc it’s HORRENDOUS🤢😡
attributes.title: this app is ✨horrible✨

attributes.review: DON’T WASTE YOUR PHONE SPACE this app wouldn’t let me download it took me five time to get it on my phone and when I got it on my phone it kept crashing I couldn’t actually do anything after I wanted to delete it I had the same problem from when I tried to download it this app is awful DON’T waste your space DON’T waste your time
attributes.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR SPACE

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to learn more about our president but it kept crashing and caused so many boomers to show up at my house they all tried to kill me when I said this app was horrible and shouldn’t be downloaded it also caused my baby sister to go crazy and start saying trump 2020 !! this app needs to be fixed asap 👁👄👁

first of all it took 5 HOURS to download and it wouldn’t let me do anything for those FIVE HOURS!!! Second right when i opened the app it said that a virus was downloading on my phone! Third because of that virus my phone overheated and exploded sending toxic fumes KILLING my mouse. This app is terrible especially the person who is running it. Do not get this app
attributes.title: deathly

attributes.review: When I first downloaded it, I got many ads nonstop and there was nothing I was able to do about it other then restart my phone which just took forever. I had to text my friends and family a hour late cuase of this app. 1000% not downloading again this app ever again. Smh
attributes.title: Just horrible

attributes.review: This app is so slow. If I could I would give it zero stars. It has horrible reviews and I should have listened! I wish I have never downloaded this app😡😡😡Donald Trump came to my house and showed me his tan line. I have never seen someone so orange in my life!! How can a dirty old Cheeto puff like him come to my house to disrespect my Hispanic household. Pop pop pop!
attributes.title: Blm & Hispanic life matter

attributes.review: i went onto the app and as soon as i opened it arms came out of my phone and pushed my grandma down the stairs😭  after it took care of old gram grams it went after my dog and pushed him off the roof thankfully the trampoline was there and caught him but after that experience he will never be the same poor ol fluffy was so full of life😖😭
attributes.title: this app is absolutely HORRENDOUS

attributes.review: This app took SO long to download and as soon as it finally installed my phone screen turned black. When that issue was fixed i couldn’t even OPEN the APP. All my other apps work amazingly, and the phone itself is in pristine condition, the app just isn’t stable. If i could rate this 0 stars, i would. 😾
attributes.title: Horrible app.

attributes.review: Whenever I downloaded this app I wanted to learn more about MY president but then my phone screen went blank many times and I couldn’t access the app then I tried to go on my social media’s and they stopped working this app makes other apps not work 0/10 do not recommend the Orange Mans App🙄
attributes.title: Bad app gave my phone terrible viruses
